body:
# piet_interpreter

an interpreter for the Piet esoteric programming language, written in Crystal.

## Installation

Add this to your application's `shard.yml`:

```yaml
dependencies:
  piet_interpreter:
    github: anicholson/piet_interpreter
```

## Usage

```crystal
require "piet_interpreter"
```

TODO: Write usage instructions here

## Contributing

1. Fork it (<https://github.com/anicholson/piet_interpreter/fork>)
2. Create your feature branch (`git checkout -b my-new-feature`)
3. Commit your changes (`git commit -am 'Add some feature'`)
4. Push to the branch (`git push origin my-new-feature`)
5. Create a new Pull Request

## Contributors

- [anicholson](https://github.com/anicholson) Andy Nicholson - creator, maintainer

def.name: from_location
def.body:
point = Point2D.new(x.to_u16, y.to_u16)
colour = Colours.to_colour(reader.get(x, y))
checked_codels = Set(Point2D).new
rejected_codels = Set(Point2D).new
checking_queue = Deque(Point2D).new
checking_queue.unshift(point)
while checking_queue.any?
  this_point = checking_queue.pop
  if (checked_codels.includes?(this_point)) || (rejected_codels.includes?(this_point))
    next
  end
  this_colour = begin
    Colours.to_colour(reader.get(this_point.x, this_point.y))
  rescue IndexError
    next
  end
  if this_colour == colour
    checked_codels.add(this_point)
  else
    rejected_codels.add(this_point)
    next
  end
  this_point.neighbours.each do |p|
    checking_queue.unshift(p)
  end
end
new(colour: colour, codels: checked_codels)

def.name: to_colour
darken
def.body:
case l
when Light
  Normal
when Normal
  Dark
when Dark
  Light
end

def.name: lighten
def.body:
case l
when Light
  Dark
when Dark
  Normal
when Normal
  Light
end

constants.name: MAPPING
constants.value: [[Commands::Noop, Commands::Push, Commands::Pop], [Commands::Add, Commands::Subtract, Commands::Multiply], [Commands::Divide, Commands::Mod, Commands::Not], [Commands::Greater, Commands::Pointer, Commands::Switch], [Commands::Dup, Commands::Roll, Commands::InDigit], [Commands::InChar, Commands::OutDigit, Commands::OutChar]]

def.name: new
def.body:
x = allocate
if x.responds_to?(:finalize)
  ::GC.add_finalizer(x)
end
x

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.size < 2
  return context
end
stack = context.stack.dup
a = stack.pop
b = stack.pop
stack.push(a + b)
context.dup.tap do |new_context|
  new_context.stack = stack
end

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.size < 2
  return context
end
context.dup.tap do |new_context|
  new_stack = context.stack.dup
  a = new_stack.pop
  b = new_stack.pop
  result = (b / a).floor
  new_stack.push(result)
  new_context.stack = new_stack
end

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.empty?
  return context
end
context.dup.tap do |new_context|
  new_stack = context.stack.dup
  a = new_stack.pop
  new_stack.push(a)
  new_stack.push(a)
  new_context.stack = new_stack
end

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.size < 2
  return context
end
context.dup.tap do |new_context|
  new_stack = context.stack.dup
  a = new_stack.pop
  b = new_stack.pop
  result = b > a ? 1_i64 : 0_i64
  new_stack.push(result)
  new_context.stack = new_stack
end

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stdin.empty?
  return context
end
new_context = context.dup
new_stack = context.stack.dup
new_stdin = context.stdin.dup
char = new_stdin.shift
new_stack.push(char.bytes.first.to_i64)
new_context.stack = new_stack
new_context.stdin = new_stdin
new_context

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stdin.empty?
  return context
end
new_context = context.dup
new_stack = context.stack.dup
new_stdin = context.stdin.dup
char = new_stdin.shift
if char.ascii_number?
  new_stack.push(char.to_i64)
  new_context.stack = new_stack
end
new_context.stdin = new_stdin
new_context

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.size < 2
  return context
end
context.dup.tap do |new_context|
  new_stack = context.stack.dup
  a = new_stack.pop
  b = new_stack.pop
  result = (b % a)
  new_stack.push(result)
  new_context.stack = new_stack
end

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.size < 2
  return context
end
context.dup.tap do |new_context|
  new_stack = context.stack.dup
  a = new_stack.pop
  b = new_stack.pop
  result = (b * a)
  new_stack.push(result)
  new_context.stack = new_stack
end

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.empty?
  return context
end
context.dup.tap do |new_context|
  new_stack = context.stack.dup
  a = new_stack.pop
  result = a == 0 ? 1_i64 : 0_i64
  new_stack.push(result)
  new_context.stack = new_stack
end

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.empty?
  return context
end
new_context = context.dup
new_stack = context.stack.dup
new_stdin = context.stdin.dup
new_stdout = context.stdout.dup
digit = new_stack.pop
if digit >= 0 && digit <= Char::MAX_CODEPOINT
  new_stdout.push(digit.chr)
end
new_context.stack = new_stack
new_context.stdin = new_stdin
new_context.stdout = new_stdout
new_context

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.empty?
  return context
end
new_context = context.dup
new_stack = context.stack.dup
new_stdin = context.stdin.dup
new_stdout = context.stdout.dup
digit = new_stack.pop
if digit < 10 && digit >= 0
  new_stdout.push(digit.to_s.chars.first)
end
new_context.stack = new_stack
new_context.stdin = new_stdin
new_context.stdout = new_stdout
new_context

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.empty?
  return context
end
new_context = context.dup
new_stack = context.stack.dup
steps = new_stack.pop
new_dp = context.dp.toggle(steps)
new_context.stack = new_stack
new_context.dp = new_dp
new_context

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.empty?
  return context
end
context.dup.tap do |new_context|
  new_stack = context.stack.dup
  new_stack.pop
  new_context.stack = new_stack
end

def.name: run
def.body:
new_stack = context.stack.dup
new_stack.push(context.current_code_block.size.to_i64)
context.dup.tap do |new_context|
  new_context.stack = new_stack
end

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.size < 2
  return context
end
new_context = context.dup
new_stack = context.stack.dup
rolls = new_stack.pop
depth = new_stack.pop
if rolls > 0
  rolls.times do
    new_stack.roll(depth)
  end
else
  if rolls < 0
    rolls = rolls * -1
    rolls.times do
      new_stack.roll(depth, top_down: false)
    end
  end
end
new_context.stack = new_stack
new_context

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.size < 2
  return context
end
context.dup.tap do |new_context|
  new_stack = context.stack.dup
  a = new_stack.pop
  b = new_stack.pop
  new_stack.push(a - b)
  new_context.stack = new_stack
end

def.name: run
def.body:
if context.stack.empty?
  return context
end
new_context = context.dup
new_stack = context.stack.dup
steps = new_stack.pop
new_cc = context.cc.toggle(steps)
new_context.stack = new_stack
new_context.cc = new_cc
new_context

constructors.name: new
constructors.args_string: (stack = Stack.new, dp = Direction::Right, cc = CodelChooserDirection::Left, current_code_block = CodeBlock::NULL)

def.name: new
def.body:
_ = allocate
_.initialize(stack, dp, cc, current_code_block)
if _.responds_to?(:finalize)
  ::GC.add_finalizer(_)
end
_

if @container == (other.@container)
else
  return false
end
true

def.name: roll
def.body:
if depth == 0
  return self
end
if empty?
  return self
end
self.tap do |s|
  holding_stack = self.class.new
  if top_down
    rolled_value = s.pop
    (depth).times do
      holding_stack.push(s.pop)
    end
    s.push(rolled_value)
    while !holding_stack.empty?
      s.push(holding_stack.pop)
    end
  else
    rolled_value = s.shift
    (depth).times do
      holding_stack.unshift(s.shift)
    end
    s.unshift(rolled_value)
    while !holding_stack.empty?
      s.unshift(holding_stack.shift)
    end
  end
end
